data.eml:eml: Distribution and variation of the giant alpha anoles (Squamata: Dactyloidae) of the genus Dactyloa in the highlands of western Panama, with the description of a new species formerly referred to as D. microtus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lotzkat, Sebastian, Hertz, Andreas, Bienentreu, Joe-Felix, Köhler, Gunther (2013): Distribution and variation of the giant alpha anoles (Squamata: Dactyloidae) of the genus Dactyloa in the highlands of western Panama, with the description of a new species formerly referred to as D. microtus. Zootaxa 3626 (1): 1-54, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.1.1
